text: Yesli My po Svoyey mudrosti otsrochim im nakazaniye za neveriye v etoy zhizni do opredelonnogo Nami vremeni - do Dnya voskreseniya, - to oni, izdevayas', nepremenno skazhut: "Chto uderzhivayet nakazaniye? Pust' On nakazhet nas seychas, yesli On veren Svoyemu obeshchaniyu". Pust' oni znayut, chto obyazatel'no budut nakazany i chto nikto ne spasot ikh ot nakazaniya, kogda ono ikh postignet.
